-   A genomics specialist at the National Reference Laboratory for Influenza and Other Respiratory Viruses in the Department of Virology of Research Institute for Tropical Medicine. As the pioneer staff of the Influenza Genomics Team, he has been involved in building the NRLâ€™s influenza genomic surveillance program from the ground up, optimizing sequencing protocols, testing bioinformatic workflows, automating data analysis, and establishing reporting standards.

-   He gained his foundational skills in data science through the PROJECT SPARTA scholarship of the Development Academy of the Philippines, and further strengthened his genomics expertise through a bioinformatics internship at the Philippine Genome Center.
